title: #6 - Represenation of World War 2 in Hearts of Iron IV (and III)
itunes:title: #6 - Represenation of World War 2 in Hearts of Iron IV (and III)
itunes:subtitle: Justin (MA in Military History) and me talk about various aspects of the portrayal of World War 2 in the Hearts of Iron Series.
description:
Justin, who has a Master in Military History, and me (Military History Visualized) talk about the representation of the Second World War in the game Hearts of Iron IV (and III).


Important Links:
